@fmassa In my application, it is not for sampling. I'm dealing with molecules and atoms. Without worrying about details of my applications, you can think this way:

In one batch, there are 1000 frames. For each frame, there are 100 points. The input is tensor of shape (1000, 100, 3) storing the xyz coordinates of all the points. And I need to compute some functions (for all frames in batch) based on the distances and angles of points within each frame. This is basically the reason why I need something to do combinatoric iterators along a dimension(here dim=1).

Hope this explanation is clear.
